Package index

All functions

rv_create_airplane()
Create risk airplane
rv_create_airplane_animation()
Create animated version with multiple scenarios
rv_create_airplane_combo()
Spread the risk among more planes
rv_create_airplane_compact()
Create a compact airplane
rv_create_airplane_seats()
Create a dataframe with seats location and names (used internally)
rv_create_arena()
Create an arena with a given ratio of places highlighted
rv_create_risk_vector()
Create risk vector based on ratio, number of places, or data frame
rv_explorer()
Run the Shiny Application
rv_img()
Converts output to an image object in standard formats.
